lead_paragraph: The island of Lesbos was ground zero for refugees flooding across the Aegean. A year later, the imprint of that experience still affects one village that tried to help.

headline.print_headline: Migrants’ Saviors, Now Suffering Crisis’ Aftermath
headline.main: Greek Villagers Rescued Migrants. Now They Are the Ones Suffering.

snippet: The island of Lesbos was ground zero for refugees flooding across the Aegean. A year later, the imprint of that experience still affects one village that tried to help....
abstract: Skala Sikaminias Journal; migrant crisis has left mark on village of Skala Sikaminias on Greek island of Lesbos, even though flood of migrants has largely stopped; tourism business has declined as European vacationers avoid areas associated with crisis and villagers contemplate how their generosity towards migrants negatively affected their livelihoods.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
